Description.Text:
Nostalgia is a non-smoking, affordable luxury boutique hotel situated in one of Singapore's most historic areas, minutes from the Central Business District, Orchard Road, Chinatown and Sentosa. Classic decor, eclectic designs with fine furnishing and chandeliers give this hotel a unique and welcoming ambience.
The hotel offers 50 rooms over four storeys, with four different room categories. The rooms are combined with a stylish and romantic decor, two-themed in design - Lush and Colonial. The Lush theme reflects the historic/ romantic aspect of the district, while the Colonial theme proves to illustrate the colonial heritage of Singapore. Each of the room is individually furnished with impressively lavish facilities, graced with original-themed art on the walls by local acclaimed artist, Andre Tan. He uses inspirations from the early 40s Singapore to create a nostalgic moment.
Our business friendly rooms are fully equipped with the latest technology that includes Wi-Fi, cable LCD TV and iPod docking stations. Quality linens of at least 350 thread counts on premium beds by Sealy make for luscious moments. Nostalgia's Superior and Deluxe rooms offer designer amenities. The Exclusive and Balcony rooms feature lavish amenities.
The property boasts a glass sided lap pool and an upcoming terrace bar on the 3rd level, with pleasant views over the surrounds and embracing a peaceful seating of contemporary outdoor rattan furniture, therefore creating an ideal spot to relax in style. It also features a remarkable Al-fresco cafe and lounge bar adjacent to the Lobby.
Though boutique in size, the hotel caters a mobile business centre, with laptop available for complimentary use for up to 3 hours per day, subject to availability. Guest is now able to work and print their documents with the laptop anywhere in the hotel, and have the documents sent to their room.
All together, Nostalgia Hotel has now become one of Tiong Bahru's best reasons to visit and experience all of its old world wonders.
Business Service Mobile Business Facilites Complimentary use of Laptop is subject to availability

Nostalgia Hotel is situated in one of Singapore's most historic areas, minutes from the Central Business District and Orchard Road. The hotel is also close to Chinatown, Sentosa and Singapore General Hospital. Pamper yourself at Nostalgia and experience a sense of affordable luxury.

SUPERIOR - ROOM - Queen/ Twin Bedding. iPod docking stations, Complimentary local newspapers, Complimentary wireless internet connection, Complimentary bottled oxygenated water, Complimentary coffee and tea facilities, Individual controlled air conditioning, 24 hours In-room dining, Safe box, Laundry/ Dry Cleaning Services, Bathrobes, Slippers, Iron & Ironing Board.

BALCONY - ROOM - Queen / King Bedding, 22SQM with Balcony
iPod docking stations, Complimentary local newspapers, Complimentary wireless internet connection, Complimentary bottled oxygenated water, Complimentary coffee and tea facilities, Individual controlled air conditioning, 24 hours In-room dining, Safe box, Laundry/ Dry Cleaning Services, Bathrobes, Slippers, Iron & Ironing Board.
